cause.description:
Brief Overview: I.Goals 1.To make a difference in the world by promoting the recycling program a.By collecting cans/bottles/etc. from our community, the BLSF committee team will recycle them. -This repeated action will be done once a month -We will make recycling boxes to encourage recycling for our community 2.To give back to our wonderful community that brought us up. We will give all profits to the Open Heart Kitchen a.Donations will be delivered annually during the Christmas season II.About Better Life Style Foundation 1.This is a project run strictly by students in the Tri-Valley area. 2.the founders of this organization, will recruit volunteers in the area to participate
1. We hope to expand our idea, and encourage recycling for our community
cause.mission: encourage families to recycle bottles and raise money for charity.
cause.name: Better Life Style Foundation
